mapper.insert: insert into client (client_name, client_id, client_pwd, client_tel) values (#{client_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{client_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{client_pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{client_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into manager (manager_name, manager_id, manager_pwd, manager_tel) values (#{manager_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_pwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(*) from client where client_id = #{id};
select count(*) from manager where manager_id = #{id};
select count(*) from client where client_name = #{name};
select count(*) from manager where manager_name = #{name};
